oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Press articles on statewide mask orders in 33 US states
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Jacobs, Philip
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: This bibliographical data base containts references from US press articles. The topic is governors' orders in 33 states for wearing masks to reduce the spread of COVID-19. The newspaper articles describe details of the orders and identify who enforces these orders and whether these enforcers had expressed reservations about their roles.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Social Sciences
COVID-19
